p: The challenge virus, FMDV isolate A/VIT/15/2012, which belongs to the A/ASIA/G-IX lineage, was obtained from the WRL. It was passaged and titrated in cattle tongue before it was used as the challenge virus and adapted to IBRS2 cells before use in the VNT. Wageningen Bioveterinary Research (WBVR), the Netherlands, supplied A22 IRQ and A MAY 97 viruses adapted to BHK-21 cells for VNT.
